item.title: Sops
item.description: Intro to sops This is just a very quick intro to sops an open sourced secrets management tool from mozilla. Sops can be used to transparently encrypt full, or partially config files, transparently in the sense that the keys in a yaml, json won’t be encrypted only the values, which allows to version control the file with git and more.
